report.title: This is Poison
report.author: Hempeater
report.bodytext: I started with 50 seeds, decided to keep 5 to see if I could grow them as houseplants. /n /n 10:00 - I begin by eating 2 seeds. The flavour is strange, the bitterness is too much. I decide to crush the remaining 43 seeds and make tea from it. /n /n 11:10 - Finished drinking the tea. /n /n 12:00 - A very mild change in awareness. /n /n 2:00 - Nothing much is happening so I go to bed. /n /n The next day I vomited when I woke up. Felt weak. Partially incapacitated. Got some gut aches and hot flashes. Around 6:00pm I vomited again after only drinking water all day. It was green. /n /n Gut pains persisted for days. /n /n Conclusion: this is poison.. not worth trying.
